text:
HORRENDOUS WAITING TIME! Do not order from this place. An estimated waiting time of 1-2 hours for the food to be done.
Order at your own risk! Please do not order from this place! They have too many orders to handle and lack of manpower to handle it. 1 out of 5 stars is already a compliment as it should be given zero. Management should come over and check this place out and try waiting too!
Sunday 9pm, have been waiting nearly 30mins. Look at the orders the screen. Service needs to be better.

this indian young man at the reception is SUPER RUDE. was there to self pick by a foodpanda order.

smart city kitchen is the pick up point, this guy told me to call the restaurant.. who do i call? the unhelpfulness is just part of the drama… first time here & such horrible customer experience

The counter staff very rude like you own them 1 million dollar face.
Also this outlet restaurant jolibee, wing stop, Mr biryani really don't know what doing inside.if you order via delivery platform always late atleast 30-60mins from pick up time. Really lousy place
for fnb I hope them wind down faster

This has to be the most worst food service I’ve ever come across! Self-Pickup took 2 hrs?! What’s the point even? If I could give a 0 star, I would.

Reply to SCK:
Clearly stated there at the plastic, Jolibee. Please improve service quality.
